item.description:
Our speaker, Matthew Raider, M.D., has presented programs all over the country about the ways mysticism and medicine intersect. He speaks from his experience both as a physician and as a long-time meditator.

Since the 1980s when near death experiences became part of the public consciousness, they have held endless fascination for us. Why? They have confirmed what mystics have been telling us since the beginning of time: ours is not a random universe, our soul lives on after our physical death, and our life has a purpose. Bridging science and mysticism, Dr. Raider draws parallels between near-death experiences and the meditation experience. He will finish with a short meditation period.
